name: Data Confidentiality
description: Measures taken to protect the confidentiality of data used in training and inference.

values.name: Fully Anonymized
values.description: Data fully anonymized using techniques like differential privacy or homomorphic encryption.

values.name: Strong Encryption
values.description: Strong encryption (e.g., AES-256) used for data at rest and in transit, strict access controls and key management practices in place.

values.name: Basic Access Controls
values.description: Sensitive data with basic access controls (e.g., passwords), but no encryption.

values.name: Minimal Protection
values.description: Highly sensitive data (e.g., PII, financial data) stored or processed with no or minimal protection.
